title: WATCHMEN Episode 4 Breakdown! New Theories and Easter Eggs!
author: Think Story
comment: Lube Man would do amazing in Derry. 🎈 Also, let me know your theories!
Will’s family is not named Reeves. That’s the name he assumed after his escape likely after Bass Reeves who he is watching a move about at the beginning of the first episode.

Ozy actually liked the cake his clones baked him this episode, as opposed to previous episodes. They learned to bake.. He's obviously starting a bakery in space, employing only clones to maximize profits and needs the catapult so the customers can get back to earth. duh

Can I get a loop of Lube man Sliding into the DM's/sewer
That was the most underrated part of this episode

Interesting theory about Cal; I definitely think something is up with his character because he's becoming more and more prominent with each episode. I feel like I was the only one wondering what happened to him during the White Night break-in (Angela throws him to the side but we never hear a peep from him after that).
description:
In this video we take a deep dive and breakdown episode 4 of HBO's Watchmen "If You Don't Like My Story, Write Your Own". We'll recap, review, point out easter eggs and details you missed of the series based off the graphic novel by Alan Moore and Dave Gibbons.

Follow me on twitter: www.twitter.com/thinkstoryYT
